# Statistical models

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, GLMsData, patchwork)
```

#### Conventions for describing data

```{r}
data(lungcap)

lungcap <- 
  lungcap |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(Smoke = factor(Smoke, labels = c('Non-smoker', 'Smoker')))

lungcap |> summary()
```

```{r}
lungcap |> ggplot(aes(Age, FEV)) + geom_point()
```
